explains: adj. 分类的，归类的；机密的，保密的
v. 把……分类，把……分级；把（信息）归入保密级别（classify 的过去式和过去分词形式）
wordGroup: classified information 机密情报；机密资料
classified advertising n. 分类广告；分类广告业务

sentences.en: The books in the library are classified according to subject.
sentences.cn: 图书馆的书按学科分类。

sentences.en: He has a security clearance that allows him access to classified information.
sentences.cn: 他有安全许可，这准许他接触机密。

sentences.en: Patients are classified into three categories.
